column4: I have downloaded and burned the newest ubuntu iso for desktops/amd.  I have an amd turion 64 X2 with 1gb ram.  When booting with the live cd, it loads after choosing to start Ubuntu and everything goes blank.  Anyone know what my problem may be?
don't really know if this is what's going on but the older installs for ubuntu had the option to change your vdeo driver
so that's what i would see... i don't remember it being there anymore tho when i installed hardy
you're in ubuntu in some capacity already right? if you want hardy why don't you just do a distro-upgrade?
